actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

official_title: To amend the Appalachian Regional Development Act of 1965 to include in the definition of Appalachian region additional counties in the State of Alabama.

summary.text: Amends the Appalachian Regional Development Act of 1965 to include in the definition of "Appalachian region" additional counties in Alabama (making them eligible for certain regional development assistance).

titles.title: To amend the Appalachian Regional Development Act of 1965 to include in the definition of Appalachian region additional counties in the State of Alabama.
